summary: Website for influencer marketing agency (Upliftkar) with black gradient styling, multi-page layout (Home, About, Services, Contact), featuring founders Samuel Mehrulia and Jayden Mark, punchline "Chal Kuch kar Upliftkar", brand partnerships service focus, and homepage contact info (upliftkar@gmail.com, Instagram: Upliftkar) plus provided logo.
architectural_notes: Planned pages: Home, About, Services, Contact.
Branding: punchline "Chal Kuch kar Upliftkar"; black gradient visual theme.
Logo usage should be site-wide (where appropriate), not limited to the header.
Ensure the same provided logo image asset is used for every logo/icon instance across the site, with correct file path/import and reliable rendering in all pages/components.
known_issues: Logo asset referenced by user but not provided in conversation content/attachment.
Logo image is not rendering (shows no picture) in one or more logo/icon placements; likely broken/mismatched asset reference or path.

existing_features.title: Create a multi-page marketing website for the influencer marketing agency “Upliftkar” with the following pages and routes: Home, About, Services, Contact.
Implement a consistent site-wide header navigation that includes the provided Upliftkar logo and links to Home, About, Services, and Contact.
Apply a black gradient visual theme across the website with a coherent, distinctive style (typography, spacing, components) and consistent use of accent color(s) (avoid blue/purple).
Home page: prominently display the punchline “Chal Kuch kar Upliftkar” and show contact details on the homepage including email “upliftkar@gmail.com” and Instagram handle “Upliftkar”.
About page: include an “About the Founders” section listing Samuel Mehrulia as Founder and Jayden Mark as Co‑Founder, with short bios (concise marketing-focused copy).
Services page: highlight that the agency specializes in Brand Partnerships and include multiple service items relevant to influencer marketing.

Contact page: provide a simple contact section that repeats the email “upliftkar@gmail.com” and Instagram handle “Upliftkar”, and includes an optional basic inquiry form that does not require external email services (e.g., mailto submission or on-page copy-to-clipboard).

Add the uploaded Upliftkar logo image as a static asset and use it for site branding (header/logo). Ensure it is optimized for web display (reasonable dimensions/file size) and has appropriate alt text.
Add generated static images (if any) under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI where appropriate (e.g., page hero background).

Replace all Upliftkar logo usages across the site to use the newly uploaded logo image (IMG_20260213_043356_921-1.webp) consistently, including the header and footer branding, and ensure there are no remaining references to any older/different logo assets.
Update the centralized branding configuration so BRAND.logo.path points to the new uploaded logo (IMG_20260213_043356_921-2.webp), and ensure the alt text remains appropriate in English.

Audit the frontend for any remaining logo/image references that do not use BRAND.logo.path (including any old logo filenames/paths) and replace them so that all logo placements use the uploaded IMG_20260213_043356_921-2.webp consistently.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create multi-page agency website (Home, About, Services, Contact)
Design theme: black gradient styling across the website
Homepage content: punchline "Chal Kuch kar Upliftkar" + contact details (upliftkar@gmail.com, Instagram: Upliftkar)
About page section for founders: Samuel Mehrulia (founder) and Jayden Mark (co-founder)
Services page including Brand Partnerships (and other service items if needed)
Add and use provided logo in site header/branding
Use the provided logo throughout the site (not just header)—e.g., footer/sections and other appropriate placements
Add the uploaded logo image file IMG_20260213_043356_921-2.webp as a frontend static asset and ensure it is served from a stable public path that can be referenced by the React app.
